about_the_game:
Palm trees, waves, surfboards… you don't need to go too far to enjoy this paradise: HOT WHEELS™ - Tropical Wave Customization Pack will bring the magic of the ocean straight to your Basement!

Includes 8 exclusive elements with a beach-life inspired design. Customize walls, floor, doors and your couch... don't you feel like you're on vacation already? But races never take a break so build your track here and get ready to make some waves! Your opponents might even enjoy the sweet sunny view, but they’re in for the most bitter defeat!

Also, this exclusive pack features 3 exclusive elements for your Unleashed Profile, with a dedicated icon, tag and background! Surf’s up!

This DLC includes:

For the Basement:
  • 2 walls
  • 2 floors
  • 1 door
  • 1 decoration
  • 1 couch
  • 1 set of 4 posters

For the Unleashed Profile:
  • 1 icon
  • 1 tag
  • 1 background

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5820K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Palm trees, waves, surfboards… enjoy a tropical paradise from the comfort of your couch! Customize your Basement and your Unleashed Profile with exclusive elements inspired by beach life… don't you feel like you're on vacation already?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
